statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content:
![](../../data/images/C613-1001-1.jpg)

ZJiaQ want to become a strong man, so he decided to play the mook jong。ZJiaQ want to put some mook jongs in his backyard. His backyard consist of n bricks that is 1*1,so it is 1*n。ZJiaQ want to put a mook jong in a brick. because of the hands of the mook jong， the distance of two mook jongs should be equal or more than 2 bricks. Now ZJiaQ want to know how many ways can ZJiaQ put mook jongs legally(at least one mook jong).

statement.title: Input
statement.content: There ar multiply cases. For each case, there is a single integer n( 1 < = n < = 60)

statement.title: Output
statement.content: Print the ways in a single line for each case.
